data.title: Court Telephone Numbers
data.meta_description: General Court Information Telephone Numbers Click Here for Judicial Officers and Courtroom Telephone Numbers.
data.text:
Court Information & Telephone Numbers

General Information

Superior Court Main Information Line (657) 622-6878

Automated voice information for Court locations throughout Orange County as well as specific departmental information including: Civil, Small Claims, Traffic and Criminal, Family Law, Family Court Services, Juvenile, Probate and Mental Health, Probate Court Services, Court Reporter and Interpretive Services (CRIS), Jury Services, Self-Help, Court Administration, and Human Resources.

Employment Opportunities (657) 622-6878 option 5

Civil (General - Unlimited) (Over $35,000)

General Information (657) 622-8451

Appeals

(657) 622-7533

Civil (Limited) ($35,000 or less) and Small Claims ($12,250 by a natural person or sole proprietorship; $6,250 for a partnership or corporation)

General Information

(657) 622-8451 Small Claims Advisory Program (714) 571-5277

Collaborative Courts Unit

Collaborative Courts Unit (657) 622-5800

Family Law Operations

Family Law (657) 622-8457 Family Law Facilitator (657) 622-5077 Family Court Services (Child Custody Mediation & Investigation) (657) 622-8456

Jury Services

General Information (657) 622-7000

Juvenile Court Operations

General Information (657) 622-8458

Juvenile Justice Commission

Commission Information (657) 622-5578

Orange County Grand Jury Services

Grand Jury (714) 834-3320

Probate / Mental Health Operations

General Information - Automated services and information 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Customer service agents available Monday–Friday 8:00 a.m. – 4:00 p.m. (657) 622-7845

Self-Help Centers

Central Justice Center (657) 622-8511 Harbor Justice Center (Newport Beach Facility) (657) 622-5756 Lamoreaux Justice Center (657) 622-5720 North Justice Center (657) 622-6623

Criminal and Traffic Operations

Criminal and Traffic - Automated services and information 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Customer service agents available Monday-Friday (8:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. (657) 622-8459 Attorney Informal Arraignments by Phone or FAX Click here
